title: About
text: This is my portfolio website. Feel free to reach out to me if you want to collaborate on a project, have any feedback or questions for an existing project, or if you would like to get to know more about me :)

title: Rblogr
text: Blog that features R vignettes that are like “mini-tutorials” for anyone interested in R.

title: Revenue Growth Model
text:
Business Analysis for Lariat Rent-A-Car

Examined and cleaned historical sales data using Excel (VLookUp, pivot tables and t-tests)
Facilitated exploratory data analysis and assessed by KPI performance.
Developed and presented models that showcased a 40% increase in profits.

title: Twitter Project
text: Using R and SQL to conduct sentiment analysis on Tweets from a range of topics.
